ygData.subject: Cantata of Soothing
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I have read, it has been confirmed that the new 34 song does not stack with Hymn.  There have been conflicting reports on the Concert Hall if it
ygData.messageBody:
From what I have read, it has been confirmed that the new 34 song does not
stack with Hymn. There have been conflicting reports on the Concert Hall if
it stacks with Clarity or not. You get message that both songs went into
effect, but some folks have stated they didn't see any noticeable difference
in mana regen. Anyone know for certain if Soothing and Clarity will stack?


Also what happens when you have two bards in the group? If both bards sing
the 34 song, will you get double the effect? I gotta feeling that it will
work like Hymn and not stack if both bards are singing it. Whats gonna suck
is if it 1) won't stack with another bard singing the 34 song AND 2) doesn't
stack with Clarity. If this is the case, then the two bards would have to
go back to both singing Clarity.

Galtin of E'ci




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
